text: $(#bd951a)Damage: $()$(#ff0000)6 DMG/1s $(#bd951a)Area: $()$(#ff0000)Low Profile, 2 Blocks in front and behind, 3 wide.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Flying. Immune to damage. Explodes after attacking for 8 seconds total.
$(br)$(#bd951a)She didn't always wear that bed sheet. After trying it on as a joke it just stuck with her.

pages.title: ‚òÅ Conceal Family
pages.text: $(#25228d)Ghost Peppers haunt zombies that pass by.
